name: Corpo Coach
description:
Game made at Slavic Game Jam 2015 in 46 hours.

You are coach hired by a corporation to motivate their employees to meet the target. Run around company and scream buzzwords and don't let corporats die.

Controls:

  • AWSD - movement
  • SPACE - Hold to scream
  • R - restart

Made by:

  • Łukasz Żmudziak - programming / game design ( https://twitter.com/lukz_dev )
  • Monika Paradowska - graphics / animations / lvl design
  • Dawid W. Mika - music / sound effects ( https://soundcloud.com/dawidwmika )

Tech:

  • LibGDX
  • Tiled Map Editor
  • Inkscape

Soundtrack: https://soundcloud.com/dawidwmika/corpo-coach-soun...
